welcome:
Welcome! 🎉
You're using our Telegram bot.
help_text:
📌 Help:
/start - About the bot
/kod - Search for a video by code
/new - Latest uploaded videos
/til - Change language
/fikr or /shikoyat - Send feedback or complaint
/maxfiylik - Privacy Policy
send_feedback: ✉️ Please write your feedback or complaint and send it:
privacy:
🔒 Privacy Policy

This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data when using our bot.

📌 We collect:
- Your Telegram User ID
- The selected language

🔐 We do not use cookies or tracking technologies.

🎥 Videos are accessed via external, safe links.

🧾 We do not store any chat history.

👤 This bot is intended for users aged 18 and older only.
subscribe_first: ⛔ Please subscribe to the following channels to access the video:
enter_code: Please enter the video code (e.g., A123):
video_not_found: ❌ Sorry, no video found for the code you entered.
